w1.name: Hallowed Mist
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gwen''' summons the Hallowed Mist around her, lasting for 5 seconds or until she leaves the area. ''Hallowed Mist'' can be recast once after {{fd|0.5}} seconds for the duration, and does so automatically if '''Gwen''' attempts to leave the area.

While inside the mist, '''Gwen''' gains 20 {{as|(+ 5% AP)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} and is {{tip|untargetable}} to all enemies (except {{tip|turret|turrets}}) outside of the mist.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Gwen''' commands the mist to move to her current location.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist around her, lasting for 5 seconds or until she leaves the area. Hallowed Mist can be recast once after 0.5 seconds for the duration, and does so automatically if Gwen attempts to leave the area.
While inside the mist, Gwen gains 20 (+ 5% AP) bonus armor and bonus magic resistance and is untargetable to all enemies (except turrets) outside of the mist.
Recast: Gwen commands the mist to move to her current location.
w1.notes:
* If '''Gwen''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} out of the area, the mist will automatically move to the dash's destination instead of '''Gwen's''' location.
** The mist will stop moving immediately if the dash is interrupted.
* All {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} targeted at '''Gwen''' by enemy champions outside the mist are {{tip|homing projectile destruction|destroyed}} upon attempting to pass through the mist or being inside the mist.
* The recast will move the mist's center 75 units through '''Gwen's''' location at the time.
** If she is {{tip|dash|dashing}}, the mist will move 75 units through her dash destination instead.
* The mist will teleport to '''Gwen's''' location if she {{tip|blink|blinks}} a far distance.
* Enemy champions outside the mist are indicated with a [[File: Hallowed Mist 2.png|30px]] broken sword.
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|22 to 14}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '0/19.333/16.667/14/11.333/0' and riot's value '22,20,18,16,14' as '22/20/18/16/14'

r1.name: Needlework
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gwen''' can activate ''Needlework'' up to 3 times, launching needles in the target direction with each cast. Each needle deals {{as|magic damage}} and applies {{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen}} to enemies it passes through, in addition to {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. For each individual target, needle hits beyond the first {{tip|slow}} by a reduced amount.

Within 6 seconds after the first cast, '''Gwen''' needs to hit a [[basic attack]] or {{ai|Snip Snip!|Gwen}} to unlock the second cast. After using the second cast, the duration is refreshed and she may repeat the aforementioned requirement to unlock the third cast. Each subsequent cast increases the amount of needles launched by 2.
{{sbc|First cast:}} '''Gwen''' launches one needle after a {{fd|0.25}} seconds cast time.
{{sbc|Second cast:}} '''Gwen''' launches three needles after a {{fd|0.5}} seconds cast time.
{{sbc|Third cast:}} '''Gwen''' launches five needles after a {{fd|0.5}} seconds cast time.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gwen can activate Needlework up to 3 times, launching needles in the target direction with each cast. Each needle deals magic damage and applies Thousand Cuts to enemies it passes through, in addition to slowing them for 1.5 seconds. For each individual target, needle hits beyond the first slow by a reduced amount.
Within 6 seconds after the first cast, Gwen needs to hit a basic attack or Snip Snip! to unlock the second cast. After using the second cast, the duration is refreshed and she may repeat the aforementioned requirement to unlock the third cast. Each subsequent cast increases the amount of needles launched by 2.
First cast: Gwen launches one needle after a 0.25 seconds cast time.
Second cast: Gwen launches three needles after a 0.5 seconds cast time.
Third cast: Gwen launches five needles after a 0.5 seconds cast time.
leveling:
{{st|Total Possible Damage|{{ap|30*9 to 80*9}} {{as|(+ 72% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 9% {{as|(+ {{fd|7.2}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}

{{st|First Cast Total Damage|{{ap|30 to 80}} {{as|(+ 8% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 1% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.8}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}

{{st|Second Cast Total Damage|{{ap|30*3 to 80*3}} {{as|(+ 24% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 3% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.4}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}

{{st|Third Cast Total Damage|{{ap|30*5 to 80*5}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 5% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}
r1.notes:
'''Details'''
* '''Gwen''' can still move during ''Needlework's'' cast times.
* The needles will fire from wherever '''Gwen''' is at the end of the cast time.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} blocks only one needle.
* ''Needlework'' is placed on an extremely short cooldown when '''Gwen''' gains a recast.
* '''Gwen's''' basic attacks which unlock the next cast have an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}.
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|120 to 80}}|Starts on-cast}}' as '0/80/40/0' and riot's value '120,100,80' as '120/100/80'

i1.name: Thousand Cuts
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Gwen's''' [[basic attack]]s, the center of {{ai|Snip Snip!|Gwen}}, and {{ai|Needlework|Gwen}} deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} equal to {{as|1% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.8}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}}.

''Thousand Cuts'' is modified based on the target:
* {{tip|heal|Heals}} '''Gwen''' for 70% of {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and most modifiers.}} dealt against {{tip|champion|champions}}, capped at {{pp|12 to 30}} {{as|(+ 7% AP)}}.
* Deals an additional {{as|{{pp|8 to 30}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} against {{tip|minions}} that are below {{as|40% of their '''maximum''' health}}.
* Deals a maximum of {{as|10 {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}} against {{tip|monsters}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Gwen's basic attacks, the center of Snip Snip!, and Needlework deal bonus magic damage equal to 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target:
* Heals Gwen for 70% of post-mitigation damage dealt against champions, capped at 12undefined − 30undefined (based on level) (+ 7% AP).
* Deals an additional 8undefined − 30undefined (based on level) bonus magic damage against minions that are below 40% of their maximum health.
* Deals a maximum of 10 (+ 25% AP) magic damage against monsters.

q1.name: Snip Snip!
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Gwen's''' [[basic attack]]s [[on-hit]] grant a [[stack]] of ''Snippy'' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Gwen''' snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing {{as|magic damage}} per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip deals {{as|true damage}} instead and applies {{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen}}.
If '''Gwen''' has any ''Snippy'' stacks, she consumes them to snip an additional time for each.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Gwen's basic attacks on-hit grant a stack of Snippy for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
Active: Gwen snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing magic damage per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip deals true damage instead and applies Thousand Cuts.
If Gwen has any Snippy stacks, she consumes them to snip an additional time for each.
leveling:
{{st|Damage per Snip|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}} to {{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}}}% AP)}}|Center Damage per Snip|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}} to {{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}}}% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 1% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.8}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}} {{st|Final Snip Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}} to {{#var:fs5}}}} {{as|(+ {{#var:fsr}}% AP)}}|Center Final Snip Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}} to {{#var:fs5}}}} {{as|(+ {{#var:fsr}}% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 1% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.8}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}

{{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}+{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}} to {{#var:fs5}}+{{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}+{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}}}}% AP)}}|Minimum Center Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}+{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}} to {{#var:fs5}}+{{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}+{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}}}}% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:pd1}}+{{#var:pd1}}*{{#var:sa1}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:pd2}}+{{#var:pd2}}*{{#var:sa1}}}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}} {{st|Maximum Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}+{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}} to {{#var:fs5}}+{{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}+{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}}}}% AP)}}|Maximum Center Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}+{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}} to {{#var:fs5}}+{{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}+{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}}}}% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:pd1}}+{{#var:pd1}}*{{#var:sa2}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:pd2}}+{{#var:pd2}}*{{#var:sa2}}}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}
q1.notes:
* Subsequent basic attacks on-hit also refresh the duration of ''Snippy'' stacks.
* The amount of ''Snippy'' stacks '''Gwen''' has is indicated below her [[health bar]].
* The damage from {{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen}} is not converted to {{as|true damage}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} blocks only one snip.
* ''Snip Snip!'' will snip from wherever '''Gwen''' is at the time.
* The first snip happens at {{tt|{{fd|0.13}} seconds|Measured, should be 0.1 seconds rounded up to 0.132 seconds}}, the last one at the end of the cast time.
** Bonus snips from ''Snippy'' stacks each happen at {{fd|0.45}}, {{fd|0.4}}, {{fd|0.35}} and {{fd|0.23}} seconds into the cast time.

e1.name: Skip 'n Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gwen''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location, and afterwards she gains {{as|10|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}} on her basic attacks, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|100 '''bonus''' attack range}} for 4 seconds.
'''Gwen's''' first basic attack within the duration refunds 50% of ''Skip 'n Slash's'' {{sti|cooldown}}.
''Skip 'n Slash'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Gwen's''' basic attack timer.
''Skip 'n Slash'' can be cast during any of '''Gwen's''' abilities, and vice versa.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gwen dashes to the target location, and afterwards she gains 10 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit on her basic attacks, bonus attack speed and 100 bonus attack range for 4 seconds.
Gwen's first basic attack within the duration refunds 50% of Skip 'n Slash's cooldown.
Skip 'n Slash resets Gwen's basic attack timer.
Skip 'n Slash can be cast during any of Gwen's abilities, and vice versa.
e1.notes:
* ''Skip 'n Slash'' has no minimum dash range.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.{{bug|2}}
